mapper.select: select video_num, video_title, video_thumbnail, rownum from (select * from food_video_tb order by video_mark_cnt desc) where rownum <= 6
select video_num, video_title, video_thumbnail, firstdate, video_mark_cnt, rownum from (select * from food_video_tb order by firstdate desc) where rownum <= 9
select video_num, video_title, video_thumbnail, rownum from (select * from food_video_tb where video_playlist = #{playList, jdbcType=VARCHAR} order by firstdate desc) where rownum<= 5

select video_num, video_title, video_thumbnail, firstdate, video_mark_cnt, rownum from ( select * from food_video_tb where video_title like '%'||#{recipe_search}||'%' or video_content like '%'||#{recipe_search}||'%' order by firstdate desc ) where rownum <= 9
mapper.insert: insert into food_video_tb (video_num, video_id, video_playlist, video_title, video_content, video_thumbnail, firstdate) values (video_num_seq.nextVal, #{video_id}, #{video_playlist}, #{video_title}, #{video_content}, #{video_thumbnail}, #{firstdate})
mapper.select: select count(*) from markvideo_tb where user_num = #{userNum} and video_num = #{videoNum}
mapper.update: update food_video_tb set video_mark_cnt = video_mark_cnt+1 where video_num = #{videoNum}
mapper.delete: delete from markvideo_tb where user_num=#{userNum} and video_num=#{videoNum}
mapper.update: update food_video_tb set video_mark_cnt = video_mark_cnt-1 where video_num = #{videoNum}
